sections.label: Landing Introduction
sections.h2: Introducing the PBO and Our Mission

components.label: Mission Statement
components.placeholder: To institutionalize global good by establishing standardized CSR measurement, facilitating CSI education and support, and advocating for accounting reforms recognizing social value.

components.label: Primary Call to Action
items: Join the initiative for global CSR standardization.

semantic.intent: To introduce the PBO's mission and invite users to join the initiative for global CSR standardization.
semantic.narrative_role: Opening introduction with mission statement and primary call to action to engage users
semantic.success_signal: Visitors understand the PBO's mission and are motivated to join the initiative.

components.label: Vision Description
components.placeholder: A world where corporate citizenship is transparently measured, socially impactful, and financially incentivized through global standards and accounting reforms.

semantic.intent: To communicate the PBO's vision for transparent, impactful, and incentivized corporate citizenship globally.
semantic.narrative_role: Vision statement setting aspirational goals and alignment with mission
semantic.success_signal: Visitors grasp the aspirational vision of transparent and socially impactful corporate citizenship.

components.label: Offerings List
items: CSR measurement framework development
CSI education and training
Strategic CSI management systems
Advocacy for accounting standard reforms

semantic.intent: To showcase the core offerings and services that the PBO provides to its audiences.
semantic.narrative_role: Overview of offerings including CSR measurement frameworks, education, strategic systems, and advocacy
semantic.success_signal: Visitors understand the breadth of PBO's offerings and support services.

sections.label: Proof Points
h3: Aligned with Global Reporting Initiative Standards and UN SDGs

components.label: Proof Points List
items: PBO structure formalizes civic duty with legal and governance frameworks.
Alignment with Global Reporting Initiative Standards and UN Sustainable Development Goals.
Utilization of SROI Network Methodology and ISO 26000 guidance for social responsibility.
Engagement with IASB and FASB for international financial reporting reforms.

semantic.intent: To build trust and credibility by presenting proof points validating the PBO's approach and alignment.
semantic.narrative_role: Evidence and proofs that demonstrate credibility via governance, alignment, methodologies, and engagement
semantic.success_signal: Visitors view the PBO as credible and trustworthy based on presented evidence.

components.label: Join Initiative
items: Join the initiative for global CSR standardization.

semantic.intent: To provide a call to action inviting visitors to participate and support the PBO's mission.
semantic.narrative_role: Final call to action encouraging user engagement and participation
semantic.success_signal: Visitors take action to join or support the global CSR standardization initiative.

components.label: Organization Background
components.placeholder: Information about the organization's background and core values focused on principled, systemic reform and global citizenship.

semantic.intent: To provide background information and core values of the organization focusing on principled systemic reform and global citizenship.
semantic.narrative_role: Introduction to the organization's background and core values
semantic.success_signal: Visitors understand the organization's background and value principles.

components.label: Mission
components.placeholder: To institutionalize global good by establishing standardized CSR measurement, facilitating CSI education and support, and advocating for accounting reforms recognizing social value.

components.label: Vision
components.placeholder: A world where corporate citizenship is transparently measured, socially impactful, and financially incentivized through global standards and accounting reforms.

semantic.intent: To clearly communicate the mission and vision that drive the organization's work and objectives.
semantic.narrative_role: Presentation of mission and vision statements
semantic.success_signal: Visitors comprehend the mission and vision underlying the organization's efforts.

components.label: Audience List
items: South African citizens with civic duty
Corporate entities engaging in CSR/CSI
Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs)
International financial and accounting standard bodies
Global CSR and sustainability stakeholders

semantic.intent: To identify and describe the key audiences that the organization is designed to support and engage.
semantic.narrative_role: Listing and describing the primary audiences served
semantic.success_signal: Visitors know the groups the organization serves and can identify with or target them.

components.label: Objectives List
items: Establish a global, public-valued CSR measurement framework.
Facilitate CSI measurement, education, and capacity building.
Advocate for revising 'Goodwill' accounting to reflect societal value.

semantic.intent: To present the three core objectives guiding the organization's cross-border efforts.
semantic.narrative_role: Summary list of foundational objectives
semantic.success_signal: Visitors clearly understand the primary objectives the organization pursues globally.

components.label: Programs Cards
items: Global CSR Measurement Framework - Develop a transparent, public-valued CSR measurement system aligned with GRI and UN SDGs.
CSI Measurement, Education, and Support - Provide education and tools to help organizations strategically manage and measure CSI activities.
Goodwill Accounting Reform Advocacy - Advocate for revising accounting standards to recognize social value in goodwill calculations.

semantic.intent: To highlight the specific programs implemented to realize the stated objectives.
semantic.narrative_role: Detailed presentation of key programs and their summaries
semantic.success_signal: Visitors connect the programs with the organization's objectives and understand their purpose.

components.label: Participate
items: Participate in CSI education and capacity building programs.

semantic.intent: To invite and motivate visitors to participate in education and capacity building initiatives aligned with the objectives.
semantic.narrative_role: Call to action to engage with and support the mission via participation
semantic.success_signal: Visitors take action to support and participate in the organization's mission and programs.

components.label: Resources Provided
items: Global Reporting Initiative Standards
UN Global Compact Ten Principles
SROI Network Methodology
ISO 26000 Guidance on Social Responsibility
IFRS 3 and IAS 38 accounting standards
Integrated Reporting Framework (IIRC)

semantic.intent: To introduce key CSR/CSI frameworks and standards relevant to the PBO's mission.
semantic.narrative_role: Listing of important global resources and standards
semantic.success_signal: Visitors recognize the frameworks and standards that underpin the organization's work.

components.label: Framework Detail Text
components.placeholder: Information on CSR/CSI measurement frameworks and related accounting and reporting standards.

semantic.intent: To provide detailed contextual information on CSR/CSI frameworks, measurement, accounting and reporting standards.
semantic.narrative_role: Descriptive content on how standards support the mission
semantic.success_signal: Visitors gain a deeper understanding of the standards contextual to the mission.

components.label: Proof Points
items: Alignment with Global Reporting Initiative Standards and UN Sustainable Development Goals.
Utilization of SROI Network Methodology and ISO 26000 guidance for social responsibility.
Engagement with IASB and FASB for international financial reporting reforms.

semantic.intent: To demonstrate the organization's alignment and credibility through global standards and methodologies.
semantic.narrative_role: Proof points validating global alignment and methodological rigor
semantic.success_signal: Visitors trust the organization's alignment with internationally recognized standards.

components.label: Education Summary
components.placeholder: Providing education and tools to help organizations strategically manage and measure CSI activities.

semantic.intent: To introduce the education and capacity building resources available to support CSI/CSR implementation.
semantic.narrative_role: Overview and introductory text on education and tools provided
semantic.success_signal: Visitors understand available education resources and their value.

components.label: Program Offerings
items: Education and training on CSR/CSI implementation
Capacity building for strategic CSI management
Access to measurement tools and resources

semantic.intent: To detail the educational program offerings to support CSI measurement and management.
semantic.narrative_role: Listing of education programs and capacity building services
semantic.success_signal: Visitors know the specific education and support programs offered.

components.label: Enroll Now
items: Participate in CSI education and capacity building programs.

semantic.intent: To motivate visitors to enroll and participate in CSI education and capacity building initiatives.
semantic.narrative_role: Call to action encouraging active participation
semantic.success_signal: Visitors enroll and participate in education and support programs.

components.label: Advocacy Description
components.placeholder: Advocating for revising accounting standards to recognize social value in goodwill calculations and incentivize CSR.

semantic.intent: To introduce the advocacy focus on revising accounting standards to recognize social value in goodwill.
semantic.narrative_role: Introduction to advocacy and its objectives
semantic.success_signal: Visitors understand advocacy goals related to accounting reforms.

components.label: Advocacy Program Details
components.placeholder: Efforts to revise accounting standards ensuring social value is properly reflected and incentivized in financial reporting.

semantic.intent: To provide detailed content on the strategic focus of advocacy for accounting reform and social value recognition.
semantic.narrative_role: Descriptive text explaining advocacy program details
semantic.success_signal: Visitors gain a thorough understanding of the advocacy efforts and rationale.

components.label: Proof Points
items: Engagement with IASB and FASB for international financial reporting reforms.
Institutionalized approaches through governance and legal frameworks.
Alignment with sustainability and social value accounting initiatives.

semantic.intent: To present proof points validating the effectiveness and reach of the advocacy efforts.
semantic.narrative_role: Evidence supporting advocacy successes and collaborations
semantic.success_signal: Visitors perceive the advocacy efforts as impactful and credible.

components.label: Support Advocacy
items: Support advocacy for accounting reforms recognizing social value.

semantic.intent: To invite visitors to support the advocacy initiatives for accounting reforms recognizing social value.
semantic.narrative_role: Call to action for advocacy support and engagement
semantic.success_signal: Visitors take action to support advocacy for accounting reforms.

components.label: News and Event Summaries
components.placeholder: Stay informed with latest news and upcoming events related to PBO's mission and work.

semantic.intent: To provide current news and summaries related to PBO's mission and operations.
semantic.narrative_role: Text updates and news summaries
semantic.success_signal: Visitors stay informed on latest developments and activities.

components.label: Event Listings
components.placeholder: Event details and schedules will be displayed here.

semantic.intent: To list upcoming community events for engagement and networking opportunities.
semantic.narrative_role: Event listings and schedules
semantic.success_signal: Visitors learn about and participate in PBO events.

components.label: Contact Description
components.placeholder: Use the form below to send inquiries or engage with the PBO.

semantic.intent: To invite and inform visitors to make contact and engage with the PBO via provided channels.
semantic.narrative_role: Introductory contact information and invitation
semantic.success_signal: Visitors are aware of the options to reach out to the PBO.

semantic.intent: To facilitate direct communication from visitors to the organization through a contact form.
semantic.narrative_role: Form fields enabling message submission
semantic.success_signal: Visitors successfully submit inquiries or messages to the PBO.

components.label: Social Links Info
components.placeholder: No social media links available at this time.

semantic.intent: To present social media connection options or state their unavailability.
semantic.narrative_role: Information on social media presence or absence
semantic.success_signal: Visitors are informed of social media availability or lack thereof.
